articles.title: AVIA Appoints Matthew Cheetham As General Manager Of The Coalition Against Piracy | Scoop News - Scoop.co.nz

articles.author: France 24
articles.title: Chinese women's Asian Cup win sparks calls for gender pay equality - FRANCE 24
articles.description: The dramatic triumph of China's women footballers at the Asian Cup has sparked calls on social media for equal pay, with commenters contrasting their performance with the dismal men's side.

articles.author: Diksha Madhok, CNN Business
articles.title: India's Gautam Adani unseats Mukesh Ambani as Asia's richest billionaire - CNN
articles.description: India's Gautam Adani has overtaken his fellow countryman Mukesh Ambani to become the wealthiest person in Asia, according to Bloomberg's list of the world's richest people.

articles.author: India TV Entertainment Desk
articles.title: Mahabharat's Bheem, actor Praveen Kumar Sobti passes away aged 74 - India TV News
articles.description: Praveen Kumar Sobti, a former athlete and Asian Games champion in discuss throw, has passed away. He was popular for his huge build and played the role of Bheem in BR Chopra's mythological show Mahabharat.
articles.content:
• Praveen had won 4 Asian Games medals and participated twice in the Olympics
  • Praveen switched to a career in acting in the late 70s and was popular for playing henchman and goon
